document_data.mainbody:
Protection from possession, 10 radius was a spell used by the Red Wizards of Thay.
When cast, this spell prevented the caster and all creatures within the protected area from being possessed. It protected against possession spells such as magic jar, from psionic-based attacks and possession by a creature such as demonic possession. It created a small area of protection around the caster,  in radius. This protected area moved with the caster.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, the spell required a material component. A broken magic jar, in which the fragments are used during the casting of this spell.The 2nd editon version of this spell used a smashed crystal or gem, the dust of which was sprinkled in a circle around those being protected.
